SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io

Class IO

java.lang.Object
ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io.IO
public final class IO extends Object
Utility class providing simplified I/O operations.

The IO class offers static methods that wrap around Files methods, rethrowing IOException as WrappedIOException for unchecked exception handling. This class also includes additional utility methods for common file operations.

      public static FileTime getLastModifiedTime(Path path)
      Retrieves the last modified time of a file.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file
      Returns:
      the FileTime representing the last modified time
      Throws:
      WrappedIOException - if an I/O error occurs
      See Also:
      • Files.getLastModifiedTime(Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...)

    • exists

      public static boolean exists(@NotNull @NotNull Path path)
      Tests whether a file exists.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to test
      Returns:
      true if the file exists; false if the file does not exist or its existence cannot be determined
      See Also:
      • Files.exists(Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...)

    • getRoot

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Optional<String> getRoot()
      Retrieves the root directory of the project.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the project root directory as a String, or an empty Optional if not available

    • readString

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String readString(@NotNull @NotNull String name, @Nullable @Nullable String directory, @Nullable @Nullable String... directories)
      Reads the content of a file with the given name from the specified directories.

      Searches for the file in the provided directories and returns its content as a String. If the file is not found in any of the directories, throws a WrappedIOException.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file to search for
      directory - the primary directory to search in (can be null)
      directories - additional directories to search in (can be null)
      Returns:
      the content of the file as a String
      Throws:
      WrappedIOException - if the file is not found in any of the specified directories
